# ColorBox Full API Documentation


--- SOURCE: README.md ---

**DevExtreme React ColorBox API v26.1.0**

***

# DevExtreme for React

[![NPM version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/devextreme-react.svg?maxAge=43200)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/devextreme-react)

The `devextreme-react` package contains the [DevExtreme component suite](http://js.devexpress.com/Demos/WidgetsGallery/) for the [React](https://react.dev/) framework.

* [Documentation](https://js.devexpress.com/React/Documentation/Guide/React_Components/DevExtreme_React_Components/)
* [Demo Gallery](https://js.devexpress.com/React/Demos/WidgetsGallery/Demo/DataGrid/Overview/React/Light/)
* [Responsive UI Templates](https://js.devexpress.com/React/Templates/UITemplates/)
* [Application Template](https://js.devexpress.com/React/Documentation/Guide/React_Components/Application_Template/)

## License

DevExpress distributes the `devextreme-react` package under the free and open-source **MIT** license.

For more information on licensing requirements, read the following articles:

* [Licensing Guide](https://js.devexpress.com/Angular/Documentation/Guide/Common/Licensing/) 
* [Licensing FAQ](https://js.devexpress.com/Licensing/)
* [EULA](https://js.devexpress.com/EULAs/DevExtremeComplete/)

DevExpress offers a [free trial](https://js.devexpress.com/Download/) of the product.

## Support & Feedback

For more information on the React framework and how to use it, see this [official documentation](https://react.dev/learn).

If you own an [active DevExtreme license](https://js.devexpress.com/Licensing/#Commercial), submit your questions, suggestions, and bug reports to the [DevExpress Support Center](https://www.devexpress.com/sc).

[DevExtreme React ColorBox API](../globals.md) / IDropDownOptionsProps

# Type Alias: IDropDownOptionsProps

> **IDropDownOptionsProps** = `React.PropsWithChildren`\<\{ `accessKey?`: `string`; `animation?`: `Record`\<`string`, `any`\> \| \{ `hide?`: `AnimationConfig`; `show?`: `AnimationConfig`; \}; `container?`: `any` \| `string`; `contentComponent?`: `React.ComponentType`\<`any`\>; `contentRender?`: (...`params`) => `React.ReactNode`; `contentTemplate?`: (`contentElement`) => `string` \| `any` \| `template`; `defaultHeight?`: `number` \| `string`; `defaultPosition?`: () => `void` \| `PositionAlignment` \| `PositionConfig`; `defaultVisible?`: `boolean`; `defaultWidth?`: `number` \| `string`; `deferRendering?`: `boolean`; `disabled?`: `boolean`; `dragAndResizeArea?`: `any` \| `string`; `dragEnabled?`: `boolean`; `dragOutsideBoundary?`: `boolean`; `enableBodyScroll?`: `boolean`; `focusStateEnabled?`: `boolean`; `fullScreen?`: `boolean`; `height?`: `number` \| `string`; `hideOnOutsideClick?`: `boolean` \| (`event`) => `boolean`; `hideOnParentScroll?`: `boolean`; `hint?`: `string`; `hoverStateEnabled?`: `boolean`; `maxHeight?`: `number` \| `string`; `maxWidth?`: `number` \| `string`; `minHeight?`: `number` \| `string`; `minWidth?`: `number` \| `string`; `onContentReady?`: (`e`) => `void`; `onDisposing?`: (`e`) => `void`; `onHeightChange?`: (`value`) => `void`; `onHidden?`: (`e`) => `void`; `onHiding?`: (`e`) => `void`; `onInitialized?`: (`e`) => `void`; `onOptionChanged?`: (`e`) => `void`; `onPositionChange?`: (`value`) => `void`; `onResize?`: (`e`) => `void`; `onResizeEnd?`: (`e`) => `void`; `onResizeStart?`: (`e`) => `void`; `onShowing?`: (`e`) => `void`; `onShown?`: (`e`) => `void`; `onTitleRendered?`: (`e`) => `void`; `onVisibleChange?`: (`value`) => `void`; `onWidthChange?`: (`value`) => `void`; `position?`: () => `void` \| `PositionAlignment` \| `PositionConfig`; `resizeEnabled?`: `boolean`; `restorePosition?`: `boolean`; `rtlEnabled?`: `boolean`; `shading?`: `boolean`; `shadingColor?`: `string`; `showCloseButton?`: `boolean`; `showTitle?`: `boolean`; `tabIndex?`: `number`; `title?`: `string`; `titleComponent?`: `React.ComponentType`\<`any`\>; `titleRender?`: (...`params`) => `React.ReactNode`; `titleTemplate?`: (`titleElement`) => `string` \| `any` \| `template`; `toolbarItems?`: `dxPopupToolbarItem`[]; `visible?`: `boolean`; `width?`: `number` \| `string`; `wrapperAttr?`: `any`; \}\>

Defined in: [devextreme-react/src/color-box.ts:226](https://github.com/mehmetor/DevExtreme/blob/67d1bae579611228bb429bb2f212926c8ea04747/packages/devextreme-react/src/color-box.ts#L226)

# Type Alias: IFieldAddonsProps

> **IFieldAddonsProps** = `React.PropsWithChildren`\<\{ `afterComponent?`: `React.ComponentType`\<`any`\>; `afterRender?`: (...`params`) => `React.ReactNode`; `afterTemplate?`: (`data`, `element`) => `string` \| `any` \| `template`; `beforeComponent?`: `React.ComponentType`\<`any`\>; `beforeRender?`: (...`params`) => `React.ReactNode`; `beforeTemplate?`: (`data`, `element`) => `string` \| `any` \| `template`; \}\>

[**DevExtreme React ColorBox API v26.1.0**](../README.md)

***

[DevExtreme React ColorBox API](../globals.md) / IFromProps
